description: This file defines a FastAPI route for retrieving personalized music recommendations for the current user in a music streaming backend service.

methods.name: List[TrackOut] get_recommendations( limit: int = Query(25, ge=1, le=100, description="Maximum number of tracks to return"), refresh: Optional[bool] = Query(False, description="Force refresh of cached recommendations"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: UserModel = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve personalized recommendations for the authenticated user.

ctags.name: get_recommendations
ctags.signature: ( limit: int = Query(25, ge=1, le=100, description="Maximum number of tracks to return"), refresh: Optional[bool] = Query(False, description="Force refresh of cached recommendations"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: UserModel = Depends(get_current_user), )
